page.title: 11Folk Customs
page.content: The flower{festival}is held once every year in and around St Peters church every year.People from all around South Yorkshire come to visit every year.There are two fairgrounds that each come to Conisbrough.Each comes once a year.One is called the ticklecock fair.It has been coming for many years. The other one used to be held on Ivanhoe Park but this been used as the site for the new Morley Place school, so now the fair is held on Old Road playing fields. Every year we celebrate Harvest Festival and Christmas in our school.Majorette bands are now very{popular}.In Conisbrough we have the Conisbrough Ivanhoe band and Castle Cavaliers.Once a year there comes a majorette gala,with bands playing, stalls selling goods, rides,and{games.
